name: simple_change
description: Single file change - modifying user service update method
diff_snippets:
diff --git a/src/services/user_service.py b/src/services/user_service.py
--- a/src/services/user_service.py
+++ b/src/services/user_service.py
@@ -120,6 +120,15 @@ class UserService:
+    def update_user(
+        self,
+        user_id: int,
+        username: Optional[str] = None,
+        email: Optional[str] = None,
+        preferences: Optional[dict] = None,
+        avatar_url: Optional[str] = None  # NEW: Added avatar support
+    ) -> User:
pr_title: Add avatar support to user profile updates
pr_description: This PR adds the ability for users to update their avatar URL when editing their profile.

should_find.reason: User entity referenced by update operation
Repository used to persist user updates
Email validation used when email is updated

should_not_find.reason: Orders not related to user profile updates
